snippet.title: Soundmarine (72h jam version)
snippet.description:
Entire gameplay walkthrough of our Ludum Dare 45 Jam submission game — Soundmarine, the rough jam version. Please watch a slightly updated (post-compo) version as well — https://youtu.be/GdnfOiPtmDg.

There were lots of things to do within the game jam span. Yeah, we managed to craft only ~3 min of a level duration, leaving time for making the game work.

Game submission is here:
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/45/$163302

Game itch.io page:
https://dustyroom.itch.io/soundmarine
